We have put in place unique systems and structures that allow us to give you high quality VPS hosting without the high price. When you sign up for our VPS hosting, we are very proud to offer you the following exciting services:

• Stable And Reliable Servers Using Newest Technology
•We guarantee 15 minutes of response times via ticket and instant assistance via live chat
•VPS Control Panel In the event you need to reinstall, restart, or console your VPS you may do so at your convenience in the VPS Control Panel.
•Our support team is lightning speed to assist you at all times.
• 99.99% Uptime Guarantee (Our servers are always on, everyday, all day, guaranteed.
• Instant Setup after payment confirmation
• No Contracts In the very rare instance that you would want to host elsewhere you can cancel your account at any time.
• RAID Protected Storage Our servers RAID hard drive technology. This technology enables your sites to be stored on two hard drives at the same time. Should one fail, the other hard drive will continue to serve your sites/applications, and there will zero down time just like nothing even happened.
